extensions.name: Devise
extensions.description: Provides authentication services for Spree, using the Devise gem such as signup, login, reset password, account confirmation and more

extensions.name: Blogs
extensions.description: Move your existing Shopify blogs over to Spree bringing all your blog posts and URL's with you

extensions.name: Pages
extensions.description: Simple, easy to use Shopify style pages for Spree 4.2 and up, with Action Text (TRIX rich text editor) ready via configs

extensions.name: Static Content
extensions.description: Manage static pages

extensions.name: Editor
extensions.description: Rich text editor for Spree with Image and File uploading in-place.

extensions.name: I18n
extensions.description: I18n translation files for Spree Commerce.

extensions.name: Globalize
extensions.description: Adds support for model translations (multi-language stores)

extensions.name: Handling Fees
extensions.description: Adds Handling Fee functionality to Spree.

extensions.name: Order Comments
extensions.description: Add commenting to orders / shipments / etc ...

extensions.name: Print Invoice
extensions.description: Create a PDF invoice for Spree orders.

extensions.name: HTML Invoice
extensions.description: Provides a "Print Invoice" button on the Admin Orders view which opens a printable HTML page with the order details

extensions.name: Analytics Trackers
extensions.description: Adds support for Analytics Trackers (Google Analytics & Segment)

extensions.name: Affiliates
extensions.description: Affiliate support for Spree Commerce.

extensions.name: Email to a friend
extensions.description: Email a friend functionality for Spree Commerce.

extensions.name: MailChimp E-Commerce
extensions.description: Full Spree Mailchimp E-Commerce integration

extensions.name: Product Feed
extensions.description: Connect your Spree store directly to Google Merchant Center and Facebook Catalog via a live RSS feed

extensions.name: Sitemap
extensions.description: Sitemap Generator for Spree Commerce.

extensions.name: Virtual Gift Card
extensions.description: A virtual gift card solution

extensions.name: Mirakl
extensions.description: Spree intergration for Mirakl API

extensions.name: Multi Vendor
extensions.description: Official marketplace extension

extensions.name: Apartment
extensions.description: Multi-tenancy for Spree using Apartment (per tenant databases).

extensions.name: Adyen
extensions.description: Adyen payment gateway integration for Spree.

extensions.name: Affirm
extensions.description: Affirm payment method

extensions.name: Amazon Pay
extensions.description: Add Pay with Amazon to your Spree Commerce solution

extensions.name: Gateway
extensions.description: Officially supported payment gateways such as Stripe, Apple Pay, Authorize.net and over 20 more

extensions.name: Braintree vzero
extensions.description: Official Spree Braintree + PayPal extension

extensions.name: Mollie
extensions.description: official Mollie payment gateway for Spree Commerce. Accept all major payment methods, including iDEAL, Bancontact, Visa, Mastercard, AmEx, and many more

extensions.name: PayPal Express
extensions.description: A better Spree PayPal Express Extension.

extensions.name: Stripe Terminal
extensions.description: Allows you to process payments with the stripe terminal via the backend of spree.

extensions.name: Digital Products
extensions.description: A Spree extension to enable downloadable products

extensions.name: Products Q&A
extensions.description: Q&A Sections for products. Logged in users can ask a question, and then admins are able to answer it. All answered (and accepted) questions are displayed on a product page

extensions.name: Videos
extensions.description: Allows linking of youtube reference IDs to products

extensions.name: Volume Pricing
extensions.description: Spree extension which supports sales volume based pricing (quantity discounts).

extensions.name: Active Shipping
extensions.description: Integration with USPS, FedEx, Canada Post and others

extensions.name: EasyPost
extensions.description: This is an extension to integrate Easy Post into Spree

extensions.name: ShipStation
extensions.description: Connect your Spree store with ShipStation, allowing ShipStation to pull shipments from your store, and when a shipment is sent, update the order with a tracking number and mark it as shipped

extensions.name: Social Login
extensions.description: Login or signup via Facebook, Twitter, Amazon and other

extensions.name: Social Sharing
extensions.description: Add social sharing buttons for your Spree products

extensions.name: Reviews
extensions.description: Straightforward review/rating functionality.

extensions.name: Avatax
extensions.description: The new officially certified Spree Avatax (Avalara) extension

extensions.name: TaxCloud
extensions.description: US sales tax extension for Spree using the Tax Cloud service.

extensions.name: TaxJar
extensions.description: Spree Taxjar is a US sales tax extension for Spree using the Taxjar service

extensions.name: Product Assembly
extensions.description: Adds ability to make product bundles

extensions.name: Related Products
extensions.description: Possible uses: Accessories, Cross Sells, Up Sells, Compatible Products, Replacement Products, Warranty & Support Products

extensions.name: Recently Viewed
extensions.description: Recently viewed products in Spree Commerce.

extensions.name: SearchKick
extensions.description: Add Elasticsearch integration to Spree, powered by searchkick

extensions.name: Wishlists
extensions.description: Wishlist extension for Spree Commerce.

extensions.name: Contact Us
extensions.description: Adds Contact Us form to your Spree Commerce store

extensions.name: Mail Settings
extensions.description: Additional settings for email send out

extensions.name: Shopify Importer
extensions.description: Migrate your Shopify store to Spree
